content: **sign up for my mailing list at https //view flodesk com/pages/63d4ba29de520bd60dc33f80** this free crochet pattern will help you make an interactive toilet paper ornament in less than an hour it unrolls and reveals a hidden surprise what a perfect way to remember this crazy year by skills chain half_double_crochet i kindly ask that you do not reproduce or repost this design as your own feel free to sell the products made using this pattern i only ask that you make sure to give credit to help support my work i would love to see your final products if you tag me as well follow me to see more of my creations www instagram com/curiouspapaya
